text: Aur jitney qisam kay jaandaar zamin per chalney walay hain aur jitney qisam kay parind janwar hain kay apnay dono baazooâ€™on per urtay hain inn mein koi qisam aisi nahi kay jo kay tumhari tarah kay giroh na hon hum ney daftar mein koi cheez nahi chori phir sab apney perwerdigar kay pass jama kiye jayen gay
